title: Icon: color
code:
<gds-flex
  width="max-content"
  padding="2xl"
  gap="m"
  flex-wrap="wrap"
  margin="0 auto"
>
  <gds-flex
    flex-direction="column"
    align-items="center"
    justify-content="flex-start"
    gap="xs"
  >
    <gds-card
      variant="secondary"
      width="100px"
      height="100px"
      align-items="center"
      justify-content="center"
      border-color="primary"
    >
      <gds-icon-ai color="primary" size="xl"></gds-icon-ai>
    </gds-card>
    <gds-flex
      flex-direction="column"
      align-items="center"
      justify-content="center"
      border-color="primary"
      gap="0"
    >
      <gds-text tag="small">Primary</gds-text>
    </gds-flex>
  </gds-flex>
  <gds-flex
    flex-direction="column"
    align-items="center"
    justify-content="flex-start"
    gap="xs"
  >
    <gds-card
      variant="secondary"
      width="100px"
      height="100px"
      align-items="center"
      justify-content="center"
      border-color="primary"
    >
      <gds-icon-ai color="secondary" size="xl"></gds-icon-ai>
    </gds-card>
    <gds-flex
      flex-direction="column"
      align-items="center"
      justify-content="center"
      border-color="primary"
      gap="0"
    >
      <gds-text tag="small">Secondary</gds-text>
    </gds-flex>
  </gds-flex>
  <gds-flex

  >
    <gds-card

    </gds-card>
    <gds-flex
      flex-direction="column"

      justify-content="center"
      border-color="primary"
      gap="0"
    >
      <gds-text tag="small">Tertiary</gds-text>
    </gds-flex>
  </gds-flex>
  <gds-flex
    flex-direction="column"
    align-items="center"
    justify-content="flex-start"
    gap="xs"
  >
    <gds-card
      variant="secondary"
      width="100px"

    >

    <gds-flex

      border-color="primary"
      gap="0"
    >

  </gds-flex>
  <gds-flex

    justify-content="flex-start"
    gap="xs"
  >
    <gds-card
      variant="secondary"
      width="100px"

      border-color="primary"

    <gds-flex
